metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10245 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Insufficient sanitization of the query parameter intemplates/html/search_opensearch.php could lead to reflected cross-sitescripting or iframe injection.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10245` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

doxygen - 1.8.13-10
doxygen-gui - 1.8.13-10
doxygen-latex - 1.8.13-10
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: doxygen package in esm-infra/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.13-10').
quantlib-refman-html: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
